active.title: APEX Platform — READY FOR VERCEL DEPLOYMENT
active.progress: Build 100% complete. Path A: Deploy UI+mock (5 min). Path B: Full Supabase backend (20-30 min). All components tested, zero TS errors, Strategy Theme styled. Awaiting Jason's deployment decision. Telegram: messages 2110-2111.

active.title: 🚀 FREQTRADE v3 — LIVE PAPER TRADING (Breakout-Only)
active.progress: ✅ LIVE (Feb 19 15:29). Migrated from custom GOD TRADER to 47K-star Freqtrade framework. Hyperopt complete: 200 epochs, identified regime_flip_exit as cancer (-$341 USDT loss). Deployed v3 breakout-only: +0.42% (+$8.42), 50% WR, Sharpe 1.27 (beat market by ~30%). 12 trades, 0.31% max DD. Running on port 8081, scanning 19 pairs. Dashboard: localhost:8081 (god/trader).

active.title: 🔮 GOD TRADER — LunarCrush Sentiment Integration
active.progress: ✅ LIVE (Feb 19 11:28). LunarCrush CLI + sentiment.py + bot integration complete. Parses price, %, AltRank, sentiment, themes from free-tier AI endpoints. Confidence multiplier (0.5x-1.5x) on every signal. Veto system, divergence detection wired. First live scan: BTC=STRONG_BULLISH (83%, AltRank #39), ETH=STRONG_BULLISH (88%). Free tier: 4 req/min → 10-min cache, 5-min cooldown. GitHub: commits 56de55e + 98d8450.

active.title: ✅ OpenClaw Webchat UI Metadata Fix
active.progress: ✅ DEPLOYED (Feb 19 17:55). Metadata blocks (JSON + timestamps) were showing in chat bubbles. Injected _stripMeta() into minified JS. Killed gateway (PID 47641), auto-restarted (76807 at 17:58). Cache-busted with ?v=3. Jason: do Ctrl+Shift+R for final cache flush.

active.title: Microsoft Teams Error 53000 — Conditional Access Compliance
active.progress: Device Azure AD joined + Intune enrolled. Root cause: Missing Primary Refresh Token (user signed in locally, not with Azure AD creds). IT visibility: can see device inventory, apps, compliance state but NOT cloud activity (local account). Solution: Test Teams web (https://teams.microsoft.com incognito) first before signing in with work account. Backups: Full device health audit completed + registry backups made.

active.title: ✅ Intune App Inventory — 134 ENTRIES NUKED + AUTO-CLEANER LIVE
active.progress: ✅ COMPLETE (Feb 19 17:47). Identified 134 registry entries (124 system-level HKLM + 10 user-level HKCU). All nuked. Auto-cleaner task installed with 4 triggers: network connect (30s), logon, startup, 6AM daily. Runs as SYSTEM silent/hidden. Apps keep working. Inventory reduced 168→44 (corporate only). Backups at Documents\registry-backups\

active.title: last30days v2.1 Skill — ✅ OPERATIONAL (Gemini CLI backend)
active.progress: ✅ FULLY CONFIGURED. Researches topics from last 30 days across Reddit (Gemini 3 Pro), X, YouTube, web. Generates copy-paste prompts. Uses GEMINI_CLI=true in ~/.config/last30days/.env (no OpenAI key needed). Custom gemini_reddit.py module is drop-in compatible with original. First call takes 2-3 min on Gemini 3 Pro capacity, then faster.

active.title: Apple Watch Series 11 46mm — UAE Price Scan ✅
active.progress: ✅ COMPLETE (Feb 19 19:35). Scanned all major UAE retailers via Gemini CLI + web_fetch + Firecrawl. Result: Jumbo ~AED 1,559 (cheapest), Amazon AED 1,599 (verified), Noon ~AED 1,600, Sharaf DG ~AED 1,649. MSRP AED 1,719. Bank discount hacks: FAB10/CITIFEB10 -AED 50. Caveat: Jumbo/Noon from Gemini (Cloudflare-blocked). Amazon verified 100%.
